text: The GHI Bronx Tennis Classic 1993 has been a tennis tournament within the ATP Challenger Series, taking place during the ATP Challenger Series 1993. The tournament was played in Bronx, in the United States from the 16th to the 22nd of August 1993, on concrete. == Winners == === Singles === Jean-Philippe Fleurian defeated in the final Chris Wilkinson 3-6, 7-5, 6-2 === Doubles === Johan de Beer / Kevin Ullyett defeated during the final Wayne Arthurs / Grant Doyle 7-6, 7-6 == External links == * Scores GHI Bronx Category:Sports in the Bronx Category:1993 in American tennis
title: 1993 GHI Bronx Tennis Classic
